srl_nokia-bgp:bgp._annotate_autonomous-system: this is the overlay AS, (also) used for auto-derived RT

evpn._annotate_keep-all-routes: to avoid route-refresh messages attracting all EVPN routes when policy changes or bgp-evpn is enabled
